banner.content: Love programming and turn ideas into reality. Curious about every details in computer science. Try different ways to slove problem when facing challenges.

about: I have been self-learning programming for two years. I am proficient in using popular React and Vue frameworks and have developed a complete website useing Express and MongoDB.

description.title: Here are a few projects I've worked on recently.

metafame.header: is a blockchain project developed by me and backend developer.
metafame.content:
I was responsible for Staking & NFT page layout and interact with blockchain smart contract, build with Next.js & Ethers.js. And introduced TypeScript to reduce bug and maintain cost.

We developed staking and NFT character mint, makeover, refresh and wardrobe system for our customer. Also I use Spine to play openbox, makeover animate and SketchFab to show 3D NFT character

velhalla.header: is my first blockchain project developed with a senior developer. We studied a lot of article for how to connect with blockchain and developed in two weeks
velhalla.content:
I was responsible for Stake & Comic & Metaverse page layout and interact with blockchain smart contract. We developed stake and trading comic NFT system, build with Next.js & Web3.js.

This is my first time learning about blockchain, that just like connect with a unstable backend API. That's why we spend a lot of time with UI & UX.

music.header: is a side project that I want to practise with Vue 3.
music.content:
build with Vue CLI 4 & Vuex & Tailwind CSS, and use Firebase Database to storage users & songs data.

In this side project practise, I was more familiar that how to developed with Vue 3. Also it was a good time to try to developing with Firebase.

stores.content:
I developing this websites at my last work, because I was working in a hardware store then. And learn Vue & Vuex in my free time.
That's why I can develop this websites from the point of the users. It has a complete CMS that you can check all products and orders at PC and mobile device.

emaily.header: is a app that can send email survey to your users and collect their feedback.
emaily.content:
In front-end, I build with React and Redux.
And use Express and MongoDB to build database server.
It's a good experience to learn about how AJAX works in server.

maskmap.header: could find masks close to your house or work
maskmap.content:
when people built maskmap in Taiwan, they usually use OSM and Leaflet. But I want to try the original Google Maps API , becsuse its UI and API are beautiful and interesting.
In this time, I've learned a lot of how to use Google Maps API .
